message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, as you know this product is worth significantly more to you. Let's work together to make this deal happen.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to this deal, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $900,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This reflects the value of the product to you, and allows for a fair deal for both of us. Let's close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $950,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $920,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $920,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to meet you at $940,000. This is a final offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise that will allow us both to walk away satisfied.  Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $940,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $930,000 for the product, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I hope we can come to an agreement.
